This method exits the program.
compareDates() - Method in class dca.com.DayCounter
This method will determine the direct relationship between the dates, whether it be the first date being after or before, or even being identical to the second.
compSize - Static variable in class dca.com.DayCounterEnum
This is the default size for most of the components.
configureDefaultElements() - Method in class dca.gui.AppWindow
One of two configuration methods, this method's operation is more complex than the first and so must call other methods to configure the components of the GUI.
configureThis() - Method in class dca.gui.AppWindow
One of two configuration methods, this configures the global window settings.
container - Variable in class dca.gui.AppWindow
A panel that contains the AppInterface.
controlSize - Static variable in class dca.com.DayCounterEnum
This is the default size for the window control components.
count - Variable in class dca.com.DayCounter
This is the count variable used to save the calculation.
countDays(int, int) - Method in class dca.com.DayCounter
This method very simply calculates the days within a month, allowing for quick addition/subtraction when calculating the difference of days.
counter() - Method in class dca.com.DayCounter
This method actually calculates the number of days between any two given dates, using a simple algorithm to add/subtract dates until the dates "match".
currentDate - Variable in class dca.gui.AppWindow
Stores the day, month, and year of the current date.
currentString - Variable in class dca.gui.AppWindow
A String array that stores the month name, the ay of the week, and the date line.
currentTime - Variable in class dca.gui.AppInterface
This is an instance of the JPanel containing the redrawn clock.
currentTimeLabel - Variable in class dca.gui.AppInterface
This is a button labeled as "Current Time", and triggers the display of the clock component.
